text: is a song that is by Radwimps. Radwimps is a Japanese band. It was one of the theme songs that was used in Your Name. It reached number one on Billboard Japan Hot 100. It was also certified for over one million downloads of the song. The song was used in the movie trailers for Your Name. It was released on 25 July 2016, before the release of the movie. It was used to promote the movie. ==Charts== Chart (2016-2017) Best spot Japan Hot 100 (Billboard Japan) 1 Japan Hot 100 (Billboard Japan) *English version 20 Japan Hot Animation (Billboard Japan) 1 Japan Radio Songs (Billboard Japan) 1 South Korea (Gaon Music Chart) 92 ===Yearly charts=== Chart (2016) Best spot Japan Hot 100 (Billboard Japan) 2 Japan Hot Animation (Billboard Japan) 1 Japan Radio Songs (Billboard Japan) 1 ===Sales and certifications=== !scope="row"| South Korea (Gaon) |N/A |205,497 |- ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2016 songs Category:Japanese music
title: Zenzenzense
